chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 has the following issue.
Thank you,

Dear ecomobile

The customer wants to cancel the order, he has the wrong country.

Regards,
Belinda from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner about the cancellation of the order. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

We have cancelled the order and refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
AS
